class_notes: This class is for students enrolled in the BSHES program only.
course_description: The Capstone seminars allow students to complete an individual project that allows them to integrate and apply knowledge, concepts, and skills learned in BSHES coursework to a topic of high public health relevance. Students can choose to take a Capstone course in Health Equity or Grant Writing.  Students undertake an independent project that will result in a final 30-50 page paper and an oral presentation.
prerequisites: This class is for BSHESMPH students only.
schedule_location: F 1pm-3:50pm in R. Randall Rollins Bldg. R344
